abilities.description: (PASSIVE)PROPHET OF AN ELDER GODIllaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.
abilities.name: PROPHET OF AN ELDER GODI

abilities.description: (Q)TENTACLE SMASHIncreases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
abilities.name: TENTACLE SMASHI

abilities.description: (W)HARSH LESSONIllaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
abilities.name: HARSH LESSONI

abilities.description: (E)TEST OF SPIRITIllaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.
abilities.name: TEST OF SPIRITI

abilities.description: (R)LEAP OF FAITHIllaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
abilities.name: LEAP OF FAITHI
